attributes.action: carry out the Government's responsibility to look after the UK residents in the coming credit crunch by cancelling overseas aid and using that money to ensure people who elected them to Government are looked after in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is reported that the UK is not in a strong position to deal with the forthcoming credit crunch.  Giving away money cannot be justified when there is a desperate need at home - that is where the responsibility of the UK Government lies - to look after its own and not those in other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
